pageContext.description: Typology: Convex face with a few major undulations; upper face essentially flat but with myriad of small ridges giving crinkled appearance; alignment generally transverse - but localised deviations,Condition: evidently complete - no breaks,Attached Material: buff soil traces in all depressions
pageContext.surface: Mainly light green matt surface; small patches more chalky green
pageContext.collection: Porter, Mr. T.E. - private (1984),Padsbridge Farm, Padsbury Lane, Congleton
